title: The French King's new declaration importing that such of his subjects as have left France upon the recalling the Edict of Nants [sic] and shall serve in the King of Denmark's troops or retire to Hamburgh, shall enjoy the moiety of the revenues arising from the estates they have in His Majesty's dominions.
author: France. Sovereign (1643-1715 : Louis XIV)
publisher: Printed at Paris and reprinted at London for Richard Baldwin ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Chetham's Library.
